get.description: Queries tables under the given account.

x-ms-client-request-id.description: If a client request id header is sent in the request, this header will be present in the response with the same value.

x-ms-request-id.description: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

x-ms-version.description: Indicates the version of the Queue service used to execute the request. This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and above.

Date.description: UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated

x-ms-continuation-NextTableName.description: This header contains the continuation token value.

parameters.name: restype
parameters.description: Required query string to get storage service stats

parameters.name: comp
parameters.description: Required query string to get storage service stats

get.description: Retrieves statistics related to replication for the Table service. It is only available on the secondary location endpoint when read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled for the storage account.

x-ms-client-request-id.description: If a client request id header is sent in the request, this header will be present in the response with the same value.

x-ms-request-id.description: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

x-ms-version.description: Indicates the version of the Table service used to execute the request. This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and above.

Date.description: UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated

HourMetrics.description: A summary of request statistics grouped by API in hourly aggregates for queues

MinuteMetrics.description: a summary of request statistics grouped by API in minute aggregates for queues

Version.description: The version of Storage Analytics to configure.

Delete.description: Indicates whether all delete requests should be logged.

Read.description: Indicates whether all read requests should be logged.

Write.description: Indicates whether all write requests should be logged.

Version.description: The version of Storage Analytics to configure.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether metrics are enabled for the Queue service.

IncludeAPIs.description: Indicates whether metrics should generate summary statistics for called API operations.

CorsRule.description: CORS is an HTTP feature that enables a web application running under one domain to access resources in another domain. Web browsers implement a security restriction known as same-origin policy that prevents a web page from calling APIs in a different domain; CORS provides a secure way to allow one domain (the origin domain) to call APIs in another domain

AllowedOrigins.description: The origin domains that are permitted to make a request against the storage service via CORS. The origin domain is the domain from which the request originates. Note that the origin must be an exact case-sensitive match with the origin that the user age sends to the service. You can also use the wildcard character '*' to allow all origin domains to make requests via CORS.

AllowedMethods.description: The methods (HTTP request verbs) that the origin domain may use for a CORS request. (comma separated)

AllowedHeaders.description: the request headers that the origin domain may specify on the CORS request.

ExposedHeaders.description: The response headers that may be sent in the response to the CORS request and exposed by the browser to the request issuer

MaxAgeInSeconds.description: The maximum amount time that a browser should cache the preflight OPTIONS request.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether a retention policy is enabled for the storage service

Days.description: Indicates the number of days that metrics or logging or soft-deleted data should be retained. All data older than this value will be deleted

GeoReplication.description: Geo-Replication information for the Secondary Storage Service

Status.description: The status of the secondary location

LastSyncTime.description: A GMT date/time value, to the second. All primary writes preceding this value are guaranteed to be available for read operations at the secondary. Primary writes after this point in time may or may not be available for reads.

TableProperties.description: The properties for creating a table.

TableName.description: The name of the table to create.

TableResponse.description: The response for a single table.

odata.metadata.description: The metadata response of the table.

TableQueryResponse.description: The properties for the table query response.

odata.metadata.description: The metadata response of the table.

TableResponseProperties.description: The properties for the table response.

odata.type.description: The odata type of the table.

odata.editLink.description: The edit link of the table.

Start.description: the date-time the policy is active

Permission.description: the permissions for the acl policy

TableEntityQueryResponse.description: The properties for the table entity query response.

odata.metadata.description: The metadata response of the table.

TableEntityProperties.description: The other properties of the table entity

Url.name: url
Url.description: The URL of the service account or table that is the targe of the desired operation.

Timeout.name: timeout
Timeout.description: The The timeout parameter is expressed in seconds. For more information, see

ApiVersionParameter.name: x-ms-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

ClientRequestId.name: x-ms-client-request-id
ClientRequestId.description: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

formatParameter.name: $format
formatParameter.description: Specifies the media type for the response

topParameter.name: $top
topParameter.description: Maximum number of records to return.

selectParameter.name: $select
selectParameter.description: Select expression using OData notation. Limits the columns on each record to just those requested, e.g. "$select=PolicyAssignmentId, ResourceId".

compAclParameter.name: comp
compAclParameter.description: Required query string to handle stored access policies for the table that may be used with Shared Access Signatures

TableEntityProperties.name: tableEntityProperties
TableEntityProperties.description: The properties for the table entity

partitionKeyParameter.name: partitionKey
partitionKeyParameter.description: The partition key of the entity

rowKeyParameter.name: rowKey
rowKeyParameter.description: The row key of the entity
